sections.heading: to 27B-4-8. Repealed.Section 27B-4-9 - County budgeting and appropriations for community service providers
sections.text: Section 27B-4-10 - Community service providers receiving funds to be approved by department.

sections.heading: County budgeting and appropriations for community service providers.
sections.text:
27B-4-9. County budgeting and appropriations for community service providers.

Each county may annually budget and appropriate funds for the establishment, support, or operation of community service providers pursuant to ยง27A-5-9.

Source:SL 2000, ch 131, ยง54.

sections.heading: Community service providers receiving funds to be approved by department.
sections.text:
27B-4-10. Community service providers receiving funds to be approved by department.

Funds budgeted and appropriated under this chapter shall be used by community service providers approved by the Department of Human Services.

Source:SL 2000, ch 131, ยง55.
